label: Provide resume for each labor category per HCATS definition
quote: The contractor will provide the resume for each labor category in accordance with the HCATS labor category defined below:

label: Project Manager must have over 10 years experience and MA/MS degree
quote: The Senior HCATS labor category has over 10 years of experience and a Master of Arts(MA)/Master of Science (MS) degree.

label: Project Manager must possess comprehensive knowledge and experience in Federal retirement and benefits
quote: The Project Manager will possess a comprehensive range of knowledge and experience in Federal retirement and benefits along with the function areas assigned.

label: Project Manager must ensure successful task completion within scheduled timeframe
quote: Ensures successful task completion within the scheduled timeframe consistent with the established scope of work to include technical solutions.

label: Project Manager must develop project plans, milestones, status reports, and other deliverables
quote: Develops project plans and milestones, status reports and other deliverables, and monitors the execution of the task for quality and against planned timelines.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must have 3-10 years experience and BA/BS or MA/MS degree
quote: The Journeyman HCATS labor category has 3 to 10 years of experience and a Bachelor of Arts (BA)/Bachelor of Science (BS) or MA/MS degree.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must possess comprehensive knowledge and experience in Federal retirement and benefits
quote: The Senior Human Resource Specialist will possess a comprehensive range of knowledge and experience in the area of Federal retirement and benefits.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must be experienced in retirement and benefits counseling, annuity estimates, and processing retirement applications
quote: The individual(s) will be experienced and possess significant knowledge in providing retirement and benefits counseling, preparing annuity estimates, reviewing, completing and processing retirement applications.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must provide support to resolve complex retirement and benefits issues
quote: Provide support to resolve complex retirement and benefits issues.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must have knowledge to research and respond to general inquiries regarding retirement and benefits
quote: The individual(s) will have the knowledge to research and respond to general inquiries regarding retirement and benefits.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must have experience collaborating with other Federal agencies
quote: The individual will have experience collaborating with other Federal agencies.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must be experienced in creating and executing plans for actions with minimal supervision
quote: The individual(s) will be experienced in creating and executing plans for actions with minimal supervision.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must possess proven administrative skills relevant to HR operations
quote: The individual(s) will possess proven administrative skills relevant to HR operations.

label: Senior Human Resources Specialist must possess strong oral and written communication capabilities
quote: The individual(s) will possess strong oral and written communication capabilities.
